summary: The Muppet Elmo is one of the most beloved characters among children across the globe. Meet the unlikely man behind the puppet - the heart and soul of Elmo - Kevin Clash.
cast: Whoopi Goldberg|Bill Barretta|Tau Bennett|Fran Brill|Carson Carr|George Clash|Gladys Clash|Kevin Clash|Joan Ganz Cooney|Arsenio Hall|Cheryl Henson|Jim Henson|Hugh Jackman|Kermit Love|Rove McManus|Rosie O'Donnell|Frank Oz|Regis Philbin|Martin P. Robinson|Caroll Spinney|Kofi Annan|Jack Black|Dick Cavett|Emilio Delgado|Ricky Gervais|Kathie Lee Gifford|Richard Hunt|Peter Jennings|Robert Keeshan|Stu Kerr|Will Lee|LL Cool J|Sonia Manzano|Bob McGrath|Jerry Nelson|Michelle Obama|Roscoe Orman|Princess Diana|Matt Robinson|Don Sahlin|Martha Stewart|Steve Whitmire|Oprah Winfrey
title: Being Elmo: A Puppeteer's Journey
